name: Mini Black Jackal Pup
description:
Mini jackal pups are handcrafted with specially selected runes to be the perfect eternal puppy.
Combine a Red, White, and Black Mini Jackal Pup with 12 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Gold Jackal Pup.
Combine 1 Black and 2 Gold Mini Jackal Pups with 20 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Stardust Jackal Pup.
